headline.main: Italy Prepares for Reconstruction, Starts Post-Quake Probe
headline.print_headline: Italy Prepares for Reconstruction, Starts Post-Quake Probe

docs.snippet: Italy began looking to the future Wednesday a week after an earthquake flattened three towns, with Premier Matteo Renzi tapping a reconstruction czar to oversee the rebuilding and investigators acquiring the first documentation into the constructi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy began looking to the future Wednesday a week after an earthquake flattened three towns, with Premier Matteo Renzi tapping a reconstruction czar to oversee the rebuilding and investigators acquiring the first documentation into the construction blamed for the high death toll.

headline.main: Samsung Updates Smartwatch, Lenovo Ditches Laptop Keyboard
headline.print_headline: Samsung Updates Smartwatch, Lenovo Ditches Laptop Keyboard

docs.snippet: Samsung's next smartwatch will come with GPS capabilities and the ability to call or text for help by triple-tapping a side button....
docs.lead_paragraph: Samsung's next smartwatch will come with GPS capabilities and the ability to call or text for help by triple-tapping a side button.

headline.main: Calm Seas, Libya's Lawless State Open Door for Migrant Flows
headline.print_headline: Calm Seas, Libya's Lawless State Open Door for Migrant Flows

docs.snippet: Calmer seas and Libya's lawlessness have opened the way for smugglers to ship thousands of migrants across the Mediterranean this week, in a striking reminder of how far Europe is from ending the migrant crisis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Calmer seas and Libya's lawlessness have opened the way for smugglers to ship thousands of migrants across the Mediterranean this week, in a striking reminder of how far Europe is from ending the migrant crisis.

headline.main: U.S. Sues to Stop Deere From Buying Precision Planting
headline.print_headline: U.S. Sues to Stop Deere From Buying Precision Planting

docs.snippet: The U.S. Justice Department filed a lawsuit on Wednesday aimed at stopping Deere & Co from buying Monsanto Co's Precision Planting farm equipment business, saying that the deal could make it more expensive for farmers to use fast, precise plan...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Justice Department filed a lawsuit on Wednesday aimed at stopping Deere & Co from buying Monsanto Co's Precision Planting farm equipment business, saying that the deal could make it more expensive for farmers to use fast, precise planting technology.

headline.main: Study: Ohio's Abortion Pill Law Led to Worse Health Outcomes
headline.print_headline: Study: Ohio's Abortion Pill Law Led to Worse Health Outcomes

docs.snippet: Ohio's restrictions on the so-called abortion pill led to a higher rate of side effects, more doctor visits and additional medical treatment for patients, according to a new study....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ohio's restrictions on the so-called abortion pill led to a higher rate of side effects, more doctor visits and additional medical treatment for patients, according to a new study.

headline.main: Dubai Opens Massive Marvel-Branded Indoor Theme Park
headline.print_headline: Dubai Opens Massive Marvel-Branded Indoor Theme Park

docs.snippet: As summer temperatures soared outside, the world's largest indoor theme park, featuring popular Marvel and Cartoon Network-branded rides, opened its doors to the public on Wednesday in the Middle East's tourist hub of Dubai — the latest in a...
docs.lead_paragraph: As summer temperatures soared outside, the world's largest indoor theme park, featuring popular Marvel and Cartoon Network-branded rides, opened its doors to the public on Wednesday in the Middle East's tourist hub of Dubai — the latest in a myriad of new attractions here.

headline.main: Slovak President Appoints New Transport Minister After Coalition Shakeup
headline.print_headline: Slovak President Appoints New Transport Minister After Coalition Shakeup

docs.snippet: President Andrej Kiska named Arpad Ersek as Slovakia's new transport minister on Wednesday to shore up the governing coalition after a split in one of the four ruling parties....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Andrej Kiska named Arpad Ersek as Slovakia's new transport minister on Wednesday to shore up the governing coalition after a split in one of the four ruling parties.

headline.main: GOP Seeks to Block McAuliffe's Latest Felon Voting Effort
headline.print_headline: GOP Seeks to Block McAuliffe's Latest Felon Voting Effort

docs.snippet: Virginia Republicans moved Wednesday to try to block Gov. Terry McAuliffe's latest effort to restore voting rights to thousands of felons, arguing that McAuliffe is defying a court order that said voting rights cannot be restored en masse....
docs.lead_paragraph: Virginia Republicans moved Wednesday to try to block Gov. Terry McAuliffe's latest effort to restore voting rights to thousands of felons, arguing that McAuliffe is defying a court order that said voting rights cannot be restored en masse.

docs.snippet: Cinema’s goth-quirk king has a new film, ”Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children,” out in September, and a recently self-published book of drawings titled ”The Napkin Art of Tim Burton.” He sketched his answers to our questions us...
docs.lead_paragraph: Cinema’s goth-quirk king has a new film, ”Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children,” out in September, and a recently self-published book of drawings titled ”The Napkin Art of Tim Burton.” He sketched his answers to our questions using pen, ink and watercolor.
